merge.heading: How to Merge Source Branch into Target Branch
merge.checkout: 1. Make sure your workspace is clean and checkout target branch
merge.resolve: 4. Resolve merge conflicts and add corrected files to index

config.title: Git Configuration
config.gcExpressionHelpText: Use Quartz Cron Expressions (SECOND MINUTE HOUR DAYOFMONTH MONTH DAYOFWEEK) to run git gc in intervals.
config.nonFastForwardDisallowedHelpText: Reject git pushes which are non fast-forward such as --force.
config.defaultBranchHelpText: This name will be used for the initialization of new git repositories. It has no effect otherwise (especially this cannot change the initial branch name for empty repositories).
config.defaultBranchValidationError: This is not a valid branch name
config.disabledHelpText: Enable or disable the Git plugin

*.description: May change the git configuration for repositories

git.description: May change the git configuration for this repository
